price: ពួកគេ(មន្ដ្រី)បានសួរវិញថាៈ តើការពិន័យរបស់គេយ៉ាង ដូចមេ្ដចដែរ បើពួកអ្នកជាអ្នកភូតកុហកវិញនោះ ?
arabic: قَالُواْ فَمَا جَزَٰٓؤُهُۥٓ إِن كُنتُمۡ كَٰذِبِينَ

version.title: Khmer translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Khmer, published by Development Society of Muslim Cambodian Society. The second edition was issued in 2012.

meta.transliteration: qālū famā jazāuhu in kuntum kādhibīna
